page.title: 14Tockwith Children's Pastimes
page.content: We conducted a survey using the children of 7 to 11 years of age in our school to find out the things we enjoy doing the most when we are not at school. Activities include, sport, playing with toys, going to youth club, going on holiday, watching the TV/video and playing with electronic games. More sedentary activities include reading, drawing and listening to popular music. The 3 most popular ways of spending our spare time are youth club, playing electronic games and watching TV. Next in choice are swimming and looking after our pets. The things we dislike doing include cleaning dad's car, shopping, filling the coal bucket and having a bath. The greatest dislike was going to bed early
